thread.title: Police probe death of man, 91, on NY apartment building roof
thread.title_full: Police probe death of man, 91, on NY apartment building roof - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Police probe death of man, 91, on NY apartment building roof
text:
BATAVIA, N.Y. (AP) - Authorities are investigating the death of a 91-year-old western New York man whose body was found on the roof of an apartment building run by a public housing authority.
Police in the city of Batavia say it's believed the man died sometime between Monday night and Tuesday morning on the roof of the building known as 400 Towers. His name hasn't been released.
A man hired by the elderly man's family to help him with daily needs discovered him missing from his apartment around 8 a.m. Tuesday and called police. Officers found the man's body on the roof.
Police say the building's video surveillance cameras show the man wandering the halls early Tuesday and walking into a stairwell leading to the roof.
An autopsy will be conducted to determine a cause of death.
